name: Toby & Gilbert
description:
Toby tries to show his friend Gilbert a video he enjoys, but his PC suddenly breaks before he can see it. Time for a trip to PC-Repair land, eh?

Game, art and music/sounds by Warfpea

made for the I Can't Draw But Want To Make A Game (Again) jam.

around 8-10 minutes long

Controls

WASD to move

Left mouse button to talk/inspect/interact

F to enter fullscreen
